Welcome to my research website.

[Here](clear.html) is the Bayesian reanalysis of the [CLEAR](https://www.nejm.org/doi/full/10.1056/NEJMoa2215024) outcomes trial under a flat or skeptical prior, considering also the co-occurrence of secondary outcomes.

[Here](orbita.html) is the Bayesian reanalysis of the [ORBITA-2](https://www.nejm.org/doi/full/10.1056/NEJMoa2310610) outcomes trial under a flat or skeptical prior, using a historical prior from the 2018 results.
